tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerDataUsage (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_usage INT,
    data_limit INT,
    usage_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50),
email VARCHAR(100),
phone_number VARCHAR(15),
subscription_type VARCHAR(20),
data_usage_mb INT)

CREATE TABLE data_usage_logs (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
customer_id INT,
log_date DATE,
data_usage_mb INT,
FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id))

CREATE TABLE fair_usage_policies (policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
subscription_type VARCHAR(20),
max_data_usage_mb INT)

CREATE TABLE regulations (regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
regulation_name VARCHAR(50),
regulation_description TEXT)
